wikipedia.title: Miss Me
wikipedia.extract: "Miss Me" is the third single by Canadian recording artist Drake from his debut album Thank Me Later. The song features labelmate and Young Money founder Lil Wayne. It was produced by Drake's long-time collaborators Boi-1da and 40. It peaked at number fifteen on US Billboard Hot 100, becoming the third consecutive track to attain chart success from the album. It was certified platinum by the Recording Industry Association of America (RIAA).
